programme.title: Space Channel Presents| Cinespace Movie Special
programme.desc: We have more inspirational and thought provoking films from around the world coming up with the best of Cinespace! In 2015, Houston Cinema Arts Society and NASA began bridging the gap of space and art by way of film. They created CineSpace to promote the creative exploration of the vast NASA archive, inviting filmmakers from around the world to showcase that footage in their masterpieces. It’s exciting watching the space industry evolve in real time, and we get to see the creative perspective of this aerospace revolution Duration: 7200

programme.title: Space Channel Movie: Invaders from Mars
programme.desc: A young boy discovers aliens from outer space have landed on Earth. These aliens are under our feet and all around us.. and the floating head has plans for us earthlings! Duration: 7200

programme.title: Space Channel News
programme.desc: News from around the space industry, around the globe....and so much more. Duration: 3600

programme.title: Space Dealers : Good Luck, Bad Luck
programme.desc: Cole gets lucky when he finds a Russian space suit in an old box. But there’s a problem – the gloves are missing. To find the gloves he has to strike a deal with Larry which sees them take a trip through the desert. Meanwhile Torie hears how Coke and Pepsi joined the space race; and she meets former NASA astronaut Winston Scott who tells her about the struggles of keeping clean in zero-G. Duration: 3600

programme.title: Space Channel Movie: Without Warning
programme.desc: Sandy and Greg are teenagers who go camping, despite warnings not to, with their friends. They soon encounter aliens, who are using the area as a hunting ground. Duration: 7200

programme.title: Space Channel Movie : Robinson Crusoe on Mars
programme.desc: Commander Kit Draper is forced to crash-land on Mars when his mission goes horribly wrong. He must figure out how to find oxygen, water, and food on the lifeless planet. Duration: 9000

programme.title: Space Channel Music
programme.desc: visual and music connection to the universe. Duration: 1800

programme.title: Space Dealers: Risk Taking, Money Making
programme.desc: Torie and Larry duke it out on the auction floor for an incredible artefact – the flight control manual used by the Apollo 9 team. This ‘instruction manual’ is a piece of space history, but with both dealers keen to win, will one of them end up paying too much? And Cole meets astronaut Scott Parazynski who risked his life on one of the most daring spacewalks ever. Duration: 3600

programme.title: Space Tourist - Going to space!
programme.desc: Sabree Edwards hosts from the Columbia Memorial Space Center in Downey, California. He takes us for an inside look at Virgin Galactic's facilities in New Mexico as well as what you can expect if you ride on Blue Origin or want to watch a launch in Florida. Duration: 1800

programme.desc: A musical and visual celebration of our connection with our home planet and the universe. Duration: 3600

programme.title: Space Channel Music Special
programme.desc: The Big Bang, a video that was conceived and the music composed by Glenna Burmer, covers the 13.8 billion years of our Universe's history, from before the beginning to today, in just over 12 minutes. Duration: 1800

programme.title: Space Channel Movie | Solar Impact
programme.desc: We start off in a cafe…but there’s more than breakfast on the menu as a solar flare gives some the appetite for….brains..(reaction yuck) Packed with lovers, secrets, and a life on the run… Also, a couple of great shorts from Cinespace. Duration: 7200

programme.title: Space Channel Movie: Solar Destruction
programme.desc: When a math prodigy discovers a new way of predicting solar flares, he tries to warn of an impending catastrophe. But no one in power will heed his warnings. Duration: 7200

programme.title: SC Movie: Invisible Invaders
programme.desc: Invisible aliens from the Moon invade the Earth by occupying the bodies of the recently deceased. A scientist, his daughter and an army Major, try to fight them. Duration: 7200

programme.desc: From an undisclosed bunker, Space Channel receives transmissions from our connections in deep space (and deep state). Duration: 1800

programme.desc: Space Channel News with continuing coverage of the SpaceX Starship program. Duration: 1800

programme.title: Space Channel Movie: I Married a Monster from Outer Space
programme.desc: Aliens arrive on Earth to possess the bodies of humans. One of their first victims is a young man, whose new wife soon realizes something is wrong with him. Duration: 5400

programme.title: Space Channel Music
programme.desc: visual and music connection to the universe. Duration: 1800

programme.title: SpacedOut! with Sarah Begum
programme.desc: Sarah sits down with Master Sri Akarshawna to discuss Astral Travel. Explained as an intentional out-of-body experience that assumes the existence of a soul called an "astral body" that is separate from the physical body and capable of traveling outside it throughout the universe. Whatever your thoughts on this, it's a fascinating conversation! Duration: 5400

programme.title: Space Dealers : The Apollo Sale
programme.desc: Torie’s son Jason joins her on the road – she’s introducing him to the family business but will he be more hindrance than help? Larry turns ‘gastronaut’ when he comes across some space food; and a collector’s flash sale sees Cole bid for an Apollo 11 item with an incredible story – how Buzz Aldrin took Holy Communion on the moon. Duration: 3600
